[center][font size=4]Daapd Change Log[/font][/center] [b]17.12.2015:[/b] Add spotify support. [b]16.11.2015:[/b] Initial Release.
Container.Name: daapd
Container.Description: DAAP (iTunes) media server with support for AirPlay devices, Apple Remote (and compatibles), MPD and internet radio.[br] [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Storing all daapd config files [br] [b]/music[/b] : Point to your music files[br]
Container.Overview: DAAP (iTunes) media server with support for AirPlay devices, Apple Remote (and compatibles), MPD and internet radio.
